website_summaries.verdict: These large soy candles excel at flooding the room with fresh and calming aromas that are universally liked, such as cedar, orange, and vanilla.
pros: Strong but not overpowering scent of peppermint and lavender
cons: You will greatly extend its burn time by lighting only 1 wick at a time

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dads girlfriend as a gift. She loved it when she opened it and said it smells really good every time she lights it, doesn’t burn too quickly either. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mariah schubert

customer_reviews.title: A Secret Santa Gift for Co-Worker
customer_reviews.text: As this was a gift for another I can only hope that she enjoys it. It was the "Relax" candle of Sandalwood and Jasmine, Sandalwood being her favorite fragrance. I do know that upon receiving it I removed from packaging to inspect for damage and was pleasantly met with its aroma, my Mother and son also loved its scent. Thank you for this great product and I may just have to purchase one or two for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candle and heavenly smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a candle addict!! I’m always searching for the best and this is definitely one of them. The scent is heavenly. It has a calming peaceful affect. The packaging and the candle is beautiful. It has three wicks (my favorite) and burns clean. I light it at night in my room and completely relax. The price is great for such high quality. I will definitely order again! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kertz

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Classy Presentation on a Smell that wisks me away to my previous life as a Magi
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to dislike. This is a marvelous, carefully prepared product. No matter the scent you get, you better like it! i.e. If you are on the fence about weather you a a sandalwood person, don't get this if you want to be smell-curious.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Give as gift or treat yourself
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift very classy gift Great presentation with candle and box
customer_reviews.author: Gordoneia

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, and I felt instantly relaxed just smelling it in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Austin G

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell! Refreshes and lightens up the room. I get alot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: RELAX
customer_reviews.text: i dont regret the price- awesome relaxing sandalwood - prompt delivery
customer_reviews.author: ABBYS

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance, modern look
customer_reviews.text: This candle looks great in my modern apartment. The scent is good and it looks much more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell; Great design
customer_reviews.text: The scent is wonderful, not too feminine and not too masculine. Perfect for after I clean the house and need the last touch or just when im winding down. The jar has a pleasant design as well, doesn't clash with anything so when I'm not using it it makes for a handsome decoration
customer_reviews.author: Vana

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing!! Just got this yesterday and my living room smells so good...
customer_reviews.author: Dana M

customer_reviews.title: Skip this candle
customer_reviews.text: This candle does not smell pleasant. It emits a strong odor of petroleum with only a slightly favorable scent being the mint. It is beautiful and makes for a great gift, if it’s purpose is to be displayed and not lit. I bought this same candle as a gift for a relative for Christmas, and now 5 months later, having gotten one for myself, am very embarrassed...
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: Great Candle, will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.text: We love this candle! Bought it for the aroma therapy benefits and its great. The scent is not overpowering or obnoxious, it's pleasant. Beautifully packaged as well. We will be buying these as gifts for people. I'm glad we found it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Don't get fool like I did
customer_reviews.text: It says that this candle is being made to burn even with three strings on. 😑 I lighted my candle and once the three strings were on, my candle went off and I had to light it again and again and over again because the Strings were going off all the time and made it worse for the second use. It was a waste of time and money because I tried to use it for a 60 minutes massage and in less than 15 minutes the candle was off 😑
customer_reviews.author: Klau

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: The Joy candle has a wonderful relaxing scent. Not over powering. It is beautiful and perfect for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: MAURINE

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent. One of a kind!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be classic cookie smell, Christmas mint or even vanilla. This is such a lovely candle. It just whispers here and there. I have it in my kitchen still!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eve Bedingfield

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Can't even use this candle! It smells horrible! Smells of lantern oil when burning
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed since the wick on this candle were so soft, they kept bending. After some time, they'd die out since they become embedded in the wax. Didn't happen on the other candle ordered from them.
customer_reviews.author: Toka

customer_reviews.title: Zero Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this due to the high number of 5 star reviews. Were these people paid? Literally burned this for about 3 hours.....zero smell whatsoever. Such a huge disappointment! I will stick to the big store names from now on.
customer_reviews.author: C,L, Richey

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but does not last long
customer_reviews.text: The smell was really great and the presentation was spot on. Such a pretty candle and the box it came in was just as adorable. The only issue I had was that it burned out REALLY fast :( It was really expensive for something that was used up in less than a week. Maybe it was just me but I feel like I’ve gotten more burn hours out of candles a lot smaller than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kyah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Candle! Does NOT stay lit or burn evenly!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to try out a new candle and read the reviews that the RENEW soy candle had a great scent. However, this candle does not stay lit or burn evenly. When we opened the candle we noticed that the wicks were super short and upon lighting them they would fizzle out quickly. So we decided to remove some of the wax but only 1 or 2 wicks at best would stay lit. We definitely do not recommend this product and will not be trying this brand again. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Ayron Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell like lilacs
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this candle!!! No smell and wicks don't stay lit. Have to relight frequently. Don't waste your money on this candle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Worse candle ever purchased. I bought it as a gift and was disappointed when I saw it after it’s use. The wicks burned all the way down leaving half of the wax intact!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Nemitz

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but bought as gift and box was destroyed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and it does smell great. I was able to smell it through the shipping packaging. However, the box is destroyed and broken and the candle had two of the wicks waxed to the candle itself and one looked broken. I have to gift this outside of the box since it is falling apart. If you are buying this for yourself o would recommend it as the scent is really great, but for gifting purposes be prepared to gift outside of the original box.
customer_reviews.author: CKlapper

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this candle for my mom for mother’s day thinking it was going to have a distinct lilac smell but I was extremely disappointed it did not smell at all and for the price I do not think it is worth it. And it does not stay lit what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: silverio

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this candle.
customer_reviews.text: The candle was not at all what I expected for the cost. No scent, did not burn well, too much candle wax left unburned. Packaging was very lovely but the candle burn is way more important. I bought a second candle but have not burned it so as not to be disappointed again. Definitely not a gifting item .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like straight citronella
customer_reviews.text: Seriously had to check whether I had accidentally bought an outdoor candle. No lavender, sage, or peppermint scent at all Update: the seller refunded me, which I appreciate, so don’t hesitate to purchase this candle! I still think it smelled like citronella though
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Buy these candles
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY!!! The mark of a good candle is the oil in it, the burn time, and is it a clean burn (no smoke)!!!! This candle ticks all the boxes. It made my home smell wonderful without even being lit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Celia and Sarah Bullock

customer_reviews.title: lovely gift
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a beautiful box and the candel jar is nicely decorated with a wood lid. This would make a lovely gift. Low scented for people who are Sensitive to loud scents.
customer_reviews.author: cathy b

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Ok scent. The packaging was high end but the candle itself was quite ordinary. Would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. This is the second that I have bought. Worth every penny. These are not so loaded with scent that you end with a headache. Truthfully, I really love these candles. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong fragrance candle ! I ordered the sandalwood and I ended up getting lavender vanilla scent but I had no other choice to keep it because it was for a gift😡
customer_reviews.author: lizabeth kidman

customer_reviews.title: Good Size Candle
customer_reviews.text: I’m really enjoying this candle! I gave four star, because the wicks are short. I state this, because they go out when too much wax hits them. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Loveeee this candle! Amazing for relaxing evenings. A little pricey for my taste but I’ll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Antenette Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and last
customer_reviews.text: Great candle. smells good and last longer than I expected it to.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: BEST CANDLE EVER
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing candle I have ever purchased in my life. If you don't own one yet you're missing out! The greatest scent, design and quality I have witnessed in a candle to date. Also, Becky "the queen of customer service" is great. Becky's uplifting, inspirational and reassuring messages make this candle all the better. I will probably never buy a candle from anywhere else ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Farris

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a strong scent but it still smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: 3wick
customer_reviews.text: Great gift packaging was amazing but candle was very expensive $25
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Medulla

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scent
customer_reviews.text: Nice candle, burned too fast and was smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Oby

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the lilac it smelled Musky like i can't describe right now !
customer_reviews.author: Valorie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Soy Candle!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of this soy candle. It’s burn time has been great. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Camella Spriggs

customer_reviews.title: No scent.  Total loss of money.
customer_reviews.text: It had absolutely no scent after hours of burning! I was highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dirty dusty box... not happy or impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my daughter.. a big candle lover. Box was dirty, dusty with candle residue and dented. Not impresssed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bowlby

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly luxury
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the scent. It is kind of weak. Bath and body works candles are better in comparison. And burns quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Marion M.

customer_reviews.title: Smells amaing
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift, smelled so good I wanted to keep it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Smells good but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but it didn't burn for very long, maybe twenty hours but probably less, which makes it feel overpriced to me.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my lady and she loves the candle. Super presentation and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A worthy candle with calming smell.
customer_reviews.text: I got this candle for my mom to Christmas and she was really happy about it. She is using it every day and it's overall a nice candle. Buy it...
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not strong
customer_reviews.text: Outside very pretty. Very nice scent, but it’s very faint. Was looking for a lavender vanilla candle that would scent the room, this isn’t it!
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Deveau

customer_reviews.title: Last for hours
customer_reviews.text: The sent was soothing and long lasting I purchased the calm scent. Will be buying more for gifts this holiday
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at all
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this candle. It burns extremely unevenly. The wax turns into so much liquid that it actually puts out the flame.
customer_reviews.author: Chez

customer_reviews.title: I’m very unsatisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: It has no smell when burning! I’m disappointed. Especially after the price. I’ve got a candle cheaper with Fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha bell

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and daughter-in-loved the candle. This is a stressful time for everyone and I wanted something to ease their busy days. The candle was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Hoffmaster

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: it doesn’t burn all the way around so it’s very difficult to light up. I won’t be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina Shank

customer_reviews.title: that the product is what you say it is
customer_reviews.text: The candles are expensive and have no scent at all.Never will I buy or recommend.no stars for you.only reason you got 1 is it wouldn't let me give none
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful candle, very happy and love the scent of Sandalwood and Jasmine
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful scent of Sandalwood and Jasmine and packaged well so arrived safely to Australia! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Great !!
customer_reviews.text: I got the candle for my Pop Pop to light when he does his daily meditation, He absolutely loves it !!
customer_reviews.author: ieshia jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great candle
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this candle. It was well scented without being overwhelming. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful candle! I’ve had a hard time finding the true lavender scented candle and this was it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Damage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle for my friend birthday gift Look at this box.
customer_reviews.author: Won Yi

customer_reviews.title: Wicks
customer_reviews.text: The wicks don't burn evenly and the candle wasn't usable after two days.
customer_reviews.author: charity williams

customer_reviews.title: weak scent
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was beautiful as is the candle. However, the scent was weak.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't smell much
customer_reviews.text: I did receive my Candle I thought it would smell when I lite it but I'm very disappointed it didn't smell very much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing scent
customer_reviews.text: In love this candle is great in quality it came in a fancy box and it smells delish filled up my living room and dining room amazing
customer_reviews.author: Royal

customer_reviews.title: Burns well, nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Really nice candle that burns evenly. Fairly expensive for a candle though.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Candle
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not too appealing to me. Has a musky smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Broken item
customer_reviews.text: Glass was broken...can’t use it! Just threw $20 away! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: redelsperger

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not a strong scent when lit. When I opened it it smelled really good but when lit it just smells like burning wax.
customer_reviews.author: DRB77

customer_reviews.title: Incredible smell!!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells AMAZING! I especially love that it makes my whole open concept living room & kitchen smell good. Never found that in a candle before.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SCENT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS SCENT AND THE CANDLE PROVIDES MORE AROMATICS THAT OTHER'S WHICH IS PERFECT. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED WITH YOUR PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Lightsey Fanning

customer_reviews.title: It's Xmas
customer_reviews.text: A quality product that will make a great Xmas present. It smells great and quality packaging.
customer_reviews.author: F. Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle, the scent is wonderful and fills the room, and it burns so evenly
customer_reviews.author: Rita J.

customer_reviews.title: Fall in Love with the Scent.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very pleasing fragrance that kills any harsh odors while, releasing a refreshing aroma throughout intended areas.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I just love the Sandlewood Jasmine candle!! Thank you for the quick resolution to the mix up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and great smelling candle. Classy touch to the coffee table!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sergeev

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, very relaxing aroma.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, very relaxing aroma. Also doesn't burn down super fast like some of my other candles.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great candle!
customer_reviews.text: Deliciously scented! Big sturdy candle; as described and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Zujio

customer_reviews.title: Candle is gorgeous and has a phenominal smell -- THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's first candle for her new condo studio. She tried it out here at home and it made the house smell like apple pie -- just wonderful.. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful aromatherapy scented candle!
customer_reviews.text: This luxurious aromatherapy candle had such stunning packaging! I purchased this scented soy candle for the woman who works at the post office and is always under tremendous stress. I thought the aromatherapy might help calm her nerves when she gets home after the long days. I saw her today, and she kept thanking me because she loves it so much. The packaging and candle are luxurious! I opted for Renew, which is a lilac scent, and she loves it. She thanked me over and over again and was happy that I appreciate her. Thank you for making such a beautiful candle!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ann Meade

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually buy candles, but since these are soy, decided to try them The fragrance is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rosco

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this smells! The packaging was very nice, would make a lovely gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: not sure these are first quality
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive these (ordered 2) - love candles, especially ones that are fragrant yet subtle. They look pretty and they smelled nice. They were a little smaller than I thought they would be. Biggest issue was that one of them had the wicks (3 per candle) so off center and close to the glass that while burning, it broke the glass! Heard a big pop and the sound of broken glass...it literally shattered and fell apart while on burning. Pretty crazy. Anyway, I don't think I'll purchase this brand again because of it. Disappointing - really felt like a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not very potent...
customer_reviews.text: These candles are packed beautifully, come in a beautiful glass and look nice on the table. However, for me, the most important reason for purchasing them was aromatherapy. They did not put out much scent even after hours of burning. For me that's the loss of three stars due to it being my #1 reason for purchase. I tried peace & relax, both with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: JD Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for anyone who enjoys receiving candles
customer_reviews.text: Awesome presentation for this candle. This makes the perfect gift for someone who enjoys candles. The box the candle comes in is made from durable cardboard. The candle is poured into a metal circle with three wicks. I only purchased one of these candles to see how well made they are and from what I can tell, these are well made and I will be purchasing more of these candles as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: First of all this candle arrived covered in a thick layer of dust. Both the outside box and the candle inside were dusty. I got the peace scent. It was supposed to be bergamot and cedar. But it says ocean breeze on it. It doesn’t smell like bergamot or cedar. It isn’t a strong scent and doesn’t smell very good at all. I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy NAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt purchasce again
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting a nice relaxing scent for the bedroom as I love Sandalwood and Jasmine for the price I paid I should've just bought a Bath and Body works candle This one has no scent at all and I am disappointed that I paid this much .
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous candle
customer_reviews.text: my husband likes peppermint. I'm not such a huge fan but does seem soothing wish it was more of a sweeter smell. boxing and candle though AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: OLD AND SCENTLESS
customer_reviews.text: These candles have been in the warehouse for an extremely long time. They no longer have a scent. I would not recommend buying these old and crusty candles.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Joe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice candle. I bought it mainly for the jar which can be used after the candle has burned. It makes a nice dish for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: C Baker

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The third wick disappeared after 3 days. The remaining two wicks did a terrible job in burning the candle evenly. They burnt down with a lot a wax left on the sides of the glass. Had to throw it out with so much wax left. Too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Franco

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping to love it! I don't.
customer_reviews.text: Container is attractive. The scent (the slight amount you can smell) is pleasant. The candle had nearly NO scent whatsoever; and burned very unevenly no matter what I did. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Allegra Giorno

customer_reviews.title: Smell of peppermint was the strongest scent, I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Smell of peppermint was the strongest scent, I didn't know notice the lavender or sage. It seemed to burn rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: lsr

customer_reviews.title: What's that smell?
customer_reviews.text: Oh wait...nothing. You could barely smell it unless you were standing on top of you. A Febreeze candle which was a third of the size was more fragrant than this.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting and smells wonderful. Packaged beautifully for gift giving too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with the quality of the wax - it was flaking all over like snow when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Susi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful aroma
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, not overpowering. lasts a long time. I have ordered other scents from this company. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Please check the quality of the Bottle you use it's  not safe I bought 5 Bottles.
customer_reviews.text: The bottles break when I was half sleep I'm so glad that I heard a Crack. Candles flaws on my table.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Ogami

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it except that it burned quickly. Other than that, it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rathman

customer_reviews.title: Calming
customer_reviews.text: I used this for relaxing. Great smell and calming if you want some alone time.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin B

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing scent and beautiful candle.
customer_reviews.text: Home use in my family room. Makes me feel relaxed!
customer_reviews.author: Gerianne Blier

product_meta.title: Luxury Scented Soy 3 Wick Candle for Stress Relief & Relaxation High Intensity Aromatherapy (Refresh - Lavender Sage Peppermint)
feature_bullets: LARGE 3 WICK CANDLE – At 13 ounces (370 grams), your room will be filled with the relaxing, refreshing, and calming aromas. The candle is 4.7" diameter x 3 ¾" tall.
BURNS EVENLY – Our exclusive blend of pure soy wax and fiber wicks that won't burn out allow you to use the entire candle.
LONG LASTING – The candle will burn for 30-45 hours.
STRONG SCENT – High intensity, highly concentrated with top quality essential oils along with pure vegetable wax.
PERFECT GIFT – For men or women, packed in a beautiful gift box, our candles are designed with beauty in mind to fit in with any décor. Comes with a wooden lid and seal to keep your candle fresh.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars58 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
